00059 #ifndef HEAP_H
00060 #define HEAP_H
00061 
00062 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00063 #include <config.h>
00064 
00065 typedef struct h_node
00066 {
00067   double weight;
00068   void *element;
00069   struct h_node *p;
00070   struct h_node *left;
00071   struct h_node *right;
00072 }
00073 HeapNode;
00074 
00075 #define HEAP_MAX        1
00076 #define HEAP_MIN        2
00077 
00078 typedef struct Heap
00079 {
00080   HeapNode *heap;
00081   int size;
00082   int dir;
00083 }
00084 Heap;

00098   extern void *Heap_ExtractTop (Heap * root);
